home.title: The tool for building trust between people and businesses
home.description: maat.ai allows you to create, protect, and share your digital identity. It's the evolution of verification.

solutions.textCreate: We use facial recognition to prevent identity thefts.
solutions.textUpload: We authenticate them and check their validity. Then we encrypt and store them in clouds protected by maximum security.
solutions.textIdentity: Share your documents with people and business in an easy, fast and secure way.

card.textPeople: Safely upload, organize, and certify personal identity documents. Share them in an easy and reliable way.
card.textTeams: Request, store, and protect your client's, employee's, and suplier's documents in a secure, private, and orderly way.

welcome.titleWelcome: Welcome to our new Tribe of Trust!
welcome.textWelcome: Identity your employees, clients and users through the request of documents and the creation of digital records, always certified in an easy and secure way.
welcome.textModal: and become one of the first to have an identity vault or request documents in an easy and practical way.
